ComicInfo.Summary:
Environmentalist and Big Energy face off in a small but prosperous boom town in North Carolina. When people begin mysteriously disappearing at a rapid rate law enforcement is at a loss for an explanation--or a guilty party. Everything begins to unravel as this mystery takes root.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Eric J & Mohan Sivakami | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Allan Otero & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | D | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover | Jay Anacleto (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | E | Death Box Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Jay Anacleto | Missing |
